item.title: Fallen Tree, 9th December
item.description:
A Tree had fallen roughly 2 weeks ago, the council came out and cut the tree as it was blocking access, but they have left all the trunk and remains of the tree yellow tape was put round this but its still needs removing as now people seem to be leaving rubbish near the branches. please remove asap.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Watersmeet Way, Greater London

item.title: 40cm by 25cm by 10cm deep pothole, 9th December
item.description:
Been here at least 2-3 weeks. At least 10cm deep, very difficult to avoid in the dark when turning in from Nether St. Likely to cause tyre damage and very dangerous for two wheelers. Directly outside 4 Gainsborough Rd.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gainsborough Road, Woodside Park, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
